text: Robert Leroy "Bob" Ehrlich, Jr. (born November 25, 1957) is an American attorney and Republican politician. He served as the 60th Governor of Maryland from 2003 to 2007. ==Other websites== * Maryland Archives gubernatorial biography. * Maryland Archives general biography. * Congressional Quarterly election library. * Ehrlich Personnel Story * MD Gubernatorial Candidates List at Ballotpedia Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:American Methodists Category:Governors of Maryland Category:Princeton University alumni Category:United States representatives from Maryland Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Bob Ehrlich
